nickegibbons: @hannahwitton firstly go you for posting a pic you don't think is flattering. Maybe we'd all have better body image if more people did that. Sadly you can no longer eat anything and everything and look the way you want to perceive yourself and maybe believe you should look. It happens to everyone, now it's time to make some assessments as to what to prioritise. A pancake flat stomach is 30% gym and 70% diet according to most personal trainers. Also remember you're the only one who can decide what's right and wrong for your body. I've never got my body back to my uni days and tonight was my fifth trip to the gym this year. Please don't over compensate or you will injure yourself
